banner.bncontent: At HCare, we offer high quality self-pay health and wellbeing services that put you at the centre of your care.

section1.description1: Locate the nearest Health Care clinic near you for easy access to a range of healthcare services.
section1.description2: Find out the answers to your questions quickly using our intuitive resource centre.
section1.description3: Ready to see a clinician? Contact our support team to arrange an appointment.

section2.title1: Proud to create trust for customers
section2.description1: At Health Care, we provide out-of-pocket health care. Our self-pay pathway is to fill the gap where people can't access health care services because they can't afford it, they want to be seen instead of waiting, or they live in areas where certain services are not provided.
section2.description2: We want all of our customers to be able to say that they feel cared for as individuals and that they feel truly heard and respected. Our friendly support team is available to answer any questions you may have and help you make informed decisions about your medical care. Find out more about the services we offer below.

section4.description1: Healthcare delivery exists to help bridge the gap between private healthcare and the national health service. We pride ourselves on being a leading provider of online care. In these times of growing demand and tight budgets, we know that some services have more to do with personal health than physical health.
section4.description2: Our services are designed to give you more options to change the things that matter to you. We strive for excellence and are constantly reviewing and evolving the way we provide you with exceptional service.

section6.title1: Start your journey towards improved healthcare today.
section6.title2: Get in touch with one of our dedicated team.
